reviewText: I will not recommend to purchase this product is awful, the quality stinks, is not original, is a DVD copy from youtube videos and old tv shows, Amazon needs to do something about this due to violation of copyrights, it will not play half of the time and when it does it will freeze (Try the product in 3 DVD players), it will jump scenes, overall the product stinks, the seller is copyright pirate, if I want it to get a copy i would just go to btjunkie and download one for free.....People watch this seller
